body_html: It turns out to be again the problem of shape. Using matmul the way I did there, generates output of shape (n,1). Using that in a context where shape (n,) was expected, silently generates quadratic blowup. This is arguably at least a usability bug, but that has already been posted elsewhere, so this one can be closed.

body: It turns out to be again the problem of shape. Using matmul the way I did there, generates output of shape (n,1). Using that in a context where shape (n,) was expected, silently generates quadratic blowup. This is arguably at least a usability bug, but that has already been posted elsewhere, so this one can be closed.
